entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 26 April 2023
